## Validate.toDecisionIndex() function

Converts a number to a [DecisionIndex](./ts-res.decisionindex.md) if it is a valid decision index.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function toDecisionIndex(index: number): Result<DecisionIndex>;
```

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[DecisionIndex](./ts-res.decisionindex.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the converted [DecisionIndex](./ts-res.decisionindex.md) if successful, or `Failure` with an error message if not.
